item.title: I thought maybe I was being paranoid
item.description:
An odd thing happened to me on twitter today. UW System had tweeted a statement from system president Ray Cross concerning Trump’s executive order banning refugees and immigrants from 7 countries. Cross’s statement is close to the most empty, useless possible such statement. So I tweeted back, asking him to revise his statement and actually take a stand against Trump’s executive order.
Note that I mentioned not just @RayWCross and @UWSystem, but also @POTUS.
